com.philips.pins.shinelib.capabilities

Interface SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate.SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener

  • Enclosing interface:
    SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate

    public static interface SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate.SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdateListener
    Interface to receive results of firmware upload and deploy.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onDeployFailed(SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdate, SHNResult shnResult)
      Indicates that deploying the firmware image has failed.
      void onDeployFinished(SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdate, SHNResult shnResult)
      Indicates that deploying the firmware image has finished successfully.
      void onProgressUpdate(SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdate, float progress)
      Indicates the progress of the firmware upload.
      void onStateChanged(SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdate)
      Indicates that the state of the capability has changed.
      void onUploadFailed(SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdate, SHNResult shnResult)
      Indicates that the upload has failed.
      void onUploadFinished(SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdate)
      Indicates that the upload of the firmware image has finished successfully.

      • onDeployFailed

        void onDeployFailed(SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdate,
                    SHNResult shnResult)
        Indicates that deploying the firmware image has failed.
        Parameters:
        shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdate - that failed to deploy the firmware image
        shnResult - reason to fail

      • onDeployFinished

        void onDeployFinished(SHNCapabilityFirmwareUpdate shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdate,
                      SHNResult shnResult)
        Indicates that deploying the firmware image has finished successfully. The shnResult parameter provides additional information about the deploy. The peripheral documentation should provide details on the meaning of this parameter.
        Parameters:
        shnCapabilityFirmwareUpdate - that finished the deploy of the firmware image
        shnResult - the result of the firmware deploy
